data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Albano, Paolo G., Bakker, Piet A. J. (2016): Annotated catalogue of the types of Triphoridae (Mollusca, Gastropoda) in the Museum fuer Naturkunde, Berlin, with lectotype designations. Zoosystematics and Evolution 92 (1): 33-78, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.92.5936, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.92.5936
